name: VR Vaders
description:
VR Vaders is a PC VR roomscale shoot em up available to buy in Early Access for a limited time price of $4.99

I've taken inspiration from classic arcade games like Geometry Wars and Space Giraffe, but with the added twist of using your entire room as the play space in VR. 

Like any good shoot em up, there are 2 aims, survive as long as you can, and rack up as high a score as possible in that time. 

Challenge mode

Challenge mode is available now in Early Access, this mode is an old skool survive an ever increasing onslaught of enemy invaders as long as you can and make your mark on the high score table. 

Arcade mode

During Early Access the Arcade mode will be developed. This is planned to be a progressive crafted wave based shooter, with varying types of waves including destruction, survival and boss waves. 

System Requirements

A PC VR system using the latest VR drivers that support OpenXR on Oculus, SteamVR or WMR.
